title: Fake Nigerian (419) Banks
body: <a href="http://www.theregister.co.uk/content/55/36798.html">The Reg has a story</a> about a site that has a list of the <a href="http://www.artists-against-419.mugus.com/419-fake-bank-websites.shtml">fake banks</a> that the <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/03/26/Nigerian_419_Scam_Emails.aspx">Nigerian Nigerian 419 scammers</a> use.  The sad thing is that people are still falling for these <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/419">pathetic scam emails</a>.

greed vs. long term stability vs. laziness
